title.rendered: Mumbai vs Maharashtra, Indian First-Class Trophy 2022: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Tips

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Prithvi Shaw, Ruturaj Gaikwad, and Rahul Tripathi have joined the Indian squad for the T20I series against New Zealand.

Mumbai: Yashasvi Jaiswal, Musheer Khan, Armaan Jaffer, Ajinkya Rahane (c), Sarfaraz Khan, Prasad Pawar (wk), Shams Mulani, Tanush Kotian, Tushar Deshpande, Mohit Avasthi, Royston Dias

Maharashtra: Naushad Shaikh, Kedar Jadhav, Ankit Bawne (c), Azim Kazi, Kaushal Tambe, Satyajeet Bachhav, Saurabh Navale (wk), Rajvardhan Hangargekar, Pradeep Dadhe, Ashay Palkar, Tajinder Dhillon

Pitch Report

Venue: Brabourne Stadium, Mumbai

(Based on the last 3 games)

1st innings average score: 324      

2nd innings average score: 370

3rd innings average score: 301

4th innings average score: 258

Wickets per innings: 7

Type: A batting beauty

Wins

Batting 1st: —

Batting 2nd: 33%

Fantasy Tips of the Day

Ajinkya Rahane has scored 5 fifties in 8 games at the Brabourne Stadium. He is also Mumbai’s second-highest run-scorer of the edition: 585 runs including 2 hundreds and a fifty in 6 games.

For Maharashtra, Azim Kazi tops the runs chart. He has collected 431 runs at an average of 54.

Kedar Jadhav made it to the Ultimate Team in 3 consecutive games, overall smashing 425 runs at 88.

Shams Mulani has been impressive with both bat and ball. In 6 games, he has taken 39 wickets (the second-most in this edition) and scored 173 runs at 25.

Tushar Deshpande’s best figures of 5 for 37 came at the very venue.

For Maharashtra, Pradeep Dadhe and Ashay Palkar have taken the majority of the wickets. Between them, they have hunted down 39 wickets in 10 games.

In the last 3 games at the venue, as many as 10 hundreds were scored.
